document_data.mainbody:
Nalos of Pumanath was the triton centurion of the sixth squad of Abydos and a member of the Nantarn Council.
Initially during the Twelfth Ser√¥s War, Nalos was skeptical about his mission and his position but, by 1370 DR, he had come to appreciate the shallow waters. His only concern was his brothers situation after the latters acquisition of Claw of Xynakt however, his contacts among the dukars reassured Nalos.
Monthly Nalos reported to his emperor via hippocampus courier on the progress of the Council.
